ProductInfo.Features:
Manufacturer/Supplier: Toshiba. Product Type: Surveillance/Network Camera. Image Sensor Type: CMOS. Illumination: 0.04, 0.
Color Supported: Color, Monochrome. Maximum Video Resolution: 800 x 600. Optical Zoom: 3x.
Connectivity Technology: Wired. Protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, HTTPS, UPnP, SNMP, RTSP, RTP, RTCP, IGMP, SMTP, FTP, DHCP, NTP, DNS, DDNS, PPPoE, QoS.
Network (RJ-45): Yes. Input Voltage: 12 V DC. Diameter: 3.3 inches.
Package Contents: IK-WB80A Network Camera, AC Adapter, CD-ROM, Quick Start Guide and Safety Precautions, Sun Shield Kit, Wall Mount Plate, Wall Mount Bracket Kit, 2 x Waterproof Connector, Screws and Anchors Kit, Wrench, Alignment Sticker, Silica Gel.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Ik Wb80a Surveillance Network Camera Color Monochrome Imaging Systems Lens Outdoor
